faqs.question: How long does it take to activate my account?
faqs.answer: You can sign up and start accepting payments instantly with our completely online onboarding process. Full activation usually takes 2-3 working days after document submission.

faqs.question: Is Razorpay secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, Razorpay is PCI DSS Level 1 compliant, which is the highest standard of security in the payments industry. We also have an in-house fraud detection system.

faqs.question: When will I get my money?
faqs.answer: Our standard settlement cycle is T+2 days, meaning money will be deposited in your bank account 2 working days after the transaction.

faqs.question: Do you support UPI?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support all major UPI apps including Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, and BHIM.

faqs.question: Can I use Razorpay without a website?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can use Razorpay Payment Links or Payment Pages to accept payments without writing a single line of code or having a website.
